This vignette describes how to use the package to calculate the likelihood of observing particular epidemiological data based on a particular set of input parameters. This is used to estimate parameter values within a Bayesian framework via Markov chain Monte Carlo sampling, as described in vignette 8.

First load the package:

```{r}
library(YellowFeverDynamics)
```
